title: AWS Solutions Optimization to Azure: Performance Tuning, Cost Optimization, and Continuous Enhancement
description: Master continuous improvement methodologies by analyzing, optimizing, and enhancing existing AWS solutions for performance, cost, security, and reliability, then implementing equivalent optimization strategies on Azure with advanced monitoring, automation, and enhancement techniques.
certificationWeight: 25% - Continuous Improvement for Existing Solutions Domain
prerequisites: Advanced understanding of cloud architecture and operations
Experience with monitoring and observability tools
Familiarity with automation and DevOps practices
learningObjectives: Implement comprehensive monitoring and observability strategies
Perform systematic performance analysis and optimization
Conduct detailed cost analysis and optimization
Enhance security posture through continuous assessment
Implement automated remediation and self-healing systems
Design and execute capacity planning strategies
Establish continuous improvement processes and KPIs

businessScenario.description: OptimizeCorp, a mature technology company, needs to optimize their existing cloud infrastructure to reduce costs by 30%, improve performance by 50%, and enhance security posture while maintaining 99.99% availability across their global platform serving 50M+ users.
requirements: Cost reduction of 30% while maintaining service levels
Proactive capacity planning and resource optimization
Business continuity and disaster recovery optimization

sections.title: Advanced Monitoring and Observability
sections.content: Implement comprehensive monitoring strategies with advanced observability, alerting, and analytics.

hands-on.aws:
1. Configure CloudWatch with custom metrics and dashboards
2. Set up X-Ray distributed tracing across services
3. Implement CloudWatch Insights for log analytics
4. Configure CloudWatch Synthetics for proactive monitoring
5. Set up Performance Insights for database optimization
6. Implement CloudWatch Composite Alarms
7. Configure automated incident response workflows
hands-on.azure:
1. Configure Azure Monitor with custom metrics
2. Set up Application Insights with distributed tracing
3. Implement Log Analytics workspaces
4. Configure Application Insights Availability Tests
5. Set up Azure SQL Analytics for database monitoring
6. Implement smart detection and alerting
7. Configure automated response with Logic Apps

4. Optimize database performance with Azure SQL

7. Configure load testing and performance validation
